DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH
DOC.TEXT: Italian Financial Markets Plunge : Italian investors , who drove Italy ' s financial markets to record highs for the year Monday on the prospect of a majority government , sent stocks and bonds lower as a right-wing coalition failed to win a decisive victory . The failure of the Freedom Alliance to win a majority in the Senate , combined with heightened factionalism within the alliance , could mean that media magnate Silvio Berlusconi ' s Forza Italia , the main party , may have to water_down some of its more radical free-market policies , analysts said . The uncertainties sent the stock_market down 208 points , or almost 2 % , to 10 # 911 .
